titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Desmodur BL XP 2468.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/18/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Copolymer of methyl ethyl ketoxime and toluenediisocyanate (Desmodur BL XP 2468).
